channel.title: A song
channel.description:
[size=6]Hello, people of MoparScape.[/size]
[size=3]This is yet another topic from me, MistaBigBoss. No, I don't give a damn about my post count. Nor do I about people that are going to call me an idiot or a retard. So for those who are not going to be serious, please don't comment at all, I will be ignoring you.[/size]
[size=3]I made a song for a game I will be selling (hopefully) soon and I need your HONEST opinions. If you think it's shit, tell me, if you think it's awesome, then tell me that. Just be honest.[/size]
[size=3]It's a song that will be playing in the background while you're killing fish in my game.[/size]
[size=3]The game can be played at: [font=Verdana]http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=527379.0[/font][/size]
[size=3]And the song can be listened at: [url=http://vreg.comli.com/Vreggie%20Fish.mp3]http://vreg.comli.com/Vreggie%20Fish.mp3[/url][/size]
[size=3]Remember, this song is meant to be BGM for an action game. Not a song to listen at while you're driving your car.[/size]

item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Davidi2:

I personally think it doesn’t really fit with the whole ‘fish’ theme

[quote=“Davidi2, post:13, topic:424827”]I personally think it doesn’t really fit with the whole ‘fish’ theme[/quote]That’s what I was thinking, but then again, it’s not really your casual fish game.

item.description:

[quote=“CreatorAlex, post:11, topic:424827”]For background music I think it serves its purpose perfectly.

I’ll have to go look at the game before I can say it fits properly.

Good job.[/quote]Thanks,

item.title: A song
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

When are you people going to stop shitting me about advertising shit? Do you really think I care about advertising on MoparScape? Come on.

I am ADVERTISING the GAMEDEV forums, to give it some traffic.

Just stop commenting on this topic before another flame starts.

Read full topic

item.title: A song
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:6, topic:424827”][quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=527491.msg3845183#msg3845183 date=1323559878]

Can’t this all just go under the development of the game?
[/quote]I don’t consider this game development.

You designed it to go with the song, then advertisted your game as the main point.[/quote]

Read full topic
